results.title: Simvastatin prevents vascular complications in the chronic reactive oxygen species murine model of systemic sclerosis.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ prevents @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Angiopathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003925 @@@vascular complications@@@ in the chronic @CHEMICAL_Reactive_Oxygen_Species @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017382 @@@reactive oxygen species@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@murine@@@ model of @DISEASE_Scleroderma_Systemic @DISEASE_MESH:D012595 @@@systemic sclerosis@@@.

results.title: Effect of simvastatin and fenofibrate on cytokine release and systemic inflammation in type 2 diabetes mellitus with mixed dyslipidemia.
